Articles.Content: Why wasn't tilts to planets added? Was it too hard?

Unity doesn't really support it.

It also doesn't support maps the size of star systems, so there's always hope.

It's not a Unity limitation, just that so much of the games code is written with the assumption that all celestial bodies' axes are parallel. Changing this would be a major refactor with all the testing and bugfixing that entails. Much as I would love to see differing tilts, I don't think it's going to happen any time soon, if ever.
Ok thanks. That particular question has been bugging me for ages.
It gets really annoying. That is what I think.
